alert.note: Alert for Lake (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 2:54PM CST until March 10 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THURSDAY TO 10 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Accumulating wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Lake IL County. * WHEN...From 6 PM Thursday to 10 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will likely impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates are likely to peak near 1 inch per hour early Thursday evening. The expected heavy, wet nature of the snow will make shoveling hazardous.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
